Sequence.Text: Once upon a time, there was an ugly barnacle. He was so ugly...

Choice.Text: "That didn't help at all", Spongebob said with tears welling in his eyes.

Choice.ChoiceText: ...that he decided to be beautiful of spirit instead, and everyone loved him.
Choice.Text: "Thanks Patrick, I feel a little better", Spongebob said, the world feeling a bit lighter.
